Name: Diamond Fizz
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with champagne.
Review: Why top a Gin Fizz with soda when you can use brut sparkling wine?
Nutrition: One serving of Diamond Fizz contains 185 calories
